individual_responses.summary: Phase 2 implementation is complete and high quality. All functional requirements for AnalysisInsights, data extraction, formatting with token budgets, and caching have been implemented. The test suite is comprehensive. Minor deviations in file structure and module consolidation are well-justified and improve cohesion.

structured_response.summary: Phase 2 implementation is complete and high quality. All functional requirements for AnalysisInsights, data extraction, formatting with token budgets, and caching have been implemented. The test suite is comprehensive. Minor deviations in file structure and module consolidation are well-justified and improve cohesion.

requirement_alignment.details: Implementation matches all requirements: AnalysisInsights dataclass fields, adaptive scaling, all priority metrics (including fan-out, entry points), and generator-specific formatting with token budgets.

success_criteria.details: Code inspection confirms implementation of required logic. Journal confirms tests passed (18/18). Token budgets are enforced in format_insights_for_prompt.

deviations.description: analysis_cache.py was not created; caching logic was integrated into analysis_insights.py.
deviations.justification: Improved module cohesion by keeping caching logic next to extraction logic. Documented in journal.

deviations.description: Files were placed in 'analysis/' subdirectory instead of parent 'llm_doc_gen/' directory.

test_coverage.details: Comprehensive test suite (test_analysis_insights.py) covers all aspects: extraction of all metrics, adaptive scaling, formatting for all generator types, token budget enforcement, and caching behavior.

code_quality.details: Code is well-structured, typed, and documented. Complex logic (like truncation and fan-out analysis) is handled cleanly.
